alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 3:04PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Gila County and the lower elevations of Yavapai County. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow above 6000 feet is likely from Tuesday evening into early Wednesday morning. These conditions will result in periods of significantly reduced visibility on roads in this time period.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
